sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_workflow_model ( id char(32) not null, modelname varchar(64) not null, modelver varchar(16) not null, modeltext varchar(128), status tinyint not null, userid char(32) not null, usertext varchar(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, lastupdate timestamp, processcount int not null, primary key(id), unique(modelname) );
create table sf_workflow_model_domain ( id char(32) not null, modelid char(32) not null, domainid char(32) not null, processcount int not null, primary key(id), unique(modelid, domainid) );

create table sf_workflow_process ( id char(32) not null, modelid char(32) not null, modelname varchar(64) not null, version varchar(16) not null, title varchar(128), pno varchar(64), ppriority tinyint not null, status tinyint not null, userid char(32), deptid char(32), domainid char(32), usertext varchar(32), createdate timestamp not null, roleid char(32), completedate timestamp, timeoutdate timestamp, comments int not null, views int not null, properties clob, primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_delegation ( id char(32) not null, delegationsource tinyint not null, sourceid char(32) not null, status tinyint not null, createdate timestamp not null, ouserid char(32) not null, ousertext varchar(32) not null, userid char(32) not null, usertext varchar(32) not null, startdate timestamp, completedate timestamp, dstartdate timestamp, dcompletedate timestamp, timeoutmark bit not null, rulehandler varchar(128), description varchar(256), description2 varchar(256), primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_activity ( id char(32) not null, processid char(32) not null, previousid char(32), tasknodeid char(32) not null, tasknodetext varchar(64) not null, tasknodetype tinyint not null, status tinyint not null, createdate timestamp not null, completedate timestamp, timeoutdate timestamp, properties clob, primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_workitem ( id char(32) not null, processid char(32) not null, activityid char(32) not null, status tinyint not null, roleid char(32) not null, userid char(32) not null, usertext varchar(32) not null, deptid char(32), domainid char(32), userid2 char(32) not null, usertext2 varchar(32), deptid2 char(32), createdate timestamp not null, completedate timestamp, readmark bit not null, readdate timestamp, topmark bit not null, fallbackid char(32), retakeid char(32), retakeref char(32), ext1 varchar(64), ext2 int not null, primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_userstat ( id char(32) not null, userid char(32) not null, workitem_running int not null, workitem_suspended int not null, workitem_delegate int not null, workitem_complete int not null, workitem_abort int not null, workitem_retake int not null, workitem_unread int not null, workview_unread int not null, primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_variable ( id char(32) not null, variablesource tinyint not null, sourceid char(32) not null, variablename varchar(32) not null, stringvalue varchar(128), clobvalue clob, primary key(id), unique(variablesource, sourceid, variablename) );

create table sf_workflow_variable_log ( id char(32) not null, variableid char(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, stringvalue varchar(128), clobvalue clob, primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_workview ( id char(32) not null, sentid char(32) not null, parentid char(32), processid char(32) not null, workitemid char(32) not null, userid char(32) not null, usertext varchar(32) not null, deptid char(32), domainid char(32), createdate timestamp not null, readmark bit not null, readdate timestamp, topmark bit not null, ext1 varchar(64), ext2 int not null, primary key(id), unique(processid, userid) );

create table sf_workflow_workview_sent ( id char(32) not null, workviewid char(32), processid char(32) not null, workitemid char(32) not null, userid char(32) not null, usertext varchar(32) not null, domainid char(32), createdate timestamp not null, primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_comment ( id char(32) not null, contentid char(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, workitemid char(32) not null, deptid char(32) not null, taskname varchar(64), ccomment clob not null, primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_comment_user ( id char(32) not null, contentid char(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, ncomments int not null, primary key(id), unique(contentid, userid) );

create table sf_workflow_comment_log ( id char(32) not null, commentid char(32), createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, logtype tinyint not null, ccomment clob not null, primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_notice ( id char(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, processid char(32) not null, status tinyint not null, typeno int not null, workitemid char(32), sentkey varchar(64), dsentdate timestamp, sentdate timestamp, sents int not null, smessage clob, primary key(id), unique(userid, sentkey) );
